meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of an interjection.
meanings.sent1: Her interjectional outburst surprised everyone in the room.
meanings.sent2: The interjectional phrase added emotion to his speech.
meanings.sent3: The interjectional comment made us all laugh.
meanings.sent4: His interjectional response was like a burst of color in a dull conversation.
meanings.sent5: The interjectional nature of her speech made it lively and engaging.

meanings.sent1: Interjectional! That's exactly what I wanted to say.
meanings.sent2: Interjectional, he exclaimed as he realized his mistake.
meanings.sent3: Interjectional! I can't believe you did that!
meanings.sent4: Her scream was so interjectional, it echoed through the entire house.
meanings.sent5: The crowd roared interjectional cheers as the team scored the winning goal.
